entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix had lain trapped moments before. She was mentioned as being in a state of distress.

entities.name: williamson
entities.description: Williamson swore that he saw You-Know-Who grab a woman and Disapparate.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge was wearing pajamas under his pin-striped cloak and was gasping as though he had just run miles.

entities.name: merlin
entities.description: Merlin's beard was mentioned in Fudge's exclamation of surprise.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore walked forward and seemed satisfied that Harry was all right.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's safety was a concern for Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Williamson and Fudge both saw You-Know-Who.
Dumbledore was concerned about Harry's safety.
